My niece wrote this letter to the editor of her high school newspaper. She's only 15. I'm very impressed with her. Many of the people I know that have Democratic beliefs hate everything about President Bush. They hate his accent, his methods of speaking, his role in deciding to go to war with Iraq, the No Child Left Behind program, and his hair. The list could go on forever. Put yourself in his place. Yes, I know, he is a grown man and is out of school, but bear with me. You are in a position of high power of one of the most powerful countries in the world. You are commander in chief of the military forces. You can say when to use the supply of nuclear weapons. If even 1% of the nuclear weapons in the world were used, all life on earth would eventually cease to exist (this I learned from one of my past teachers). There is a country who we think has certain weapons of mass destruction. If they do, they would change life as we know it. Of course, the only logical thing to do in order to preserve human life is to go in and make sure everything is safe. It was, but you can't just leave. A surgeon can't cut someone open, do what needs to be done, and then send the person off to live their life. They need to stitch them up, do physical therapy, take off bandages, or do even more surgery. People tell us to get out of Iraq now. Okay, "ill wake you up from surgery without any stitches. Lovely. Weapons of Mass destruction ARE our business, when it can negatively affect the whole world, it is. To quote your article, "What we really need to do is pull ourselves out of other countries' business." Sure, your life threatening disease is none of my business, no surgery. Have a glorious day. Our soldiers joined military forces knowing that they may have to risk their lives. You don't join the military because you think it will be a fun vacation. Rather than complaining about our soldiers dying, can't we honor those who died and thank those that are still living and fight every day for us? If you "love living here," act like it. There was no draft. Citizens were not forced to fight. They did this because they love and care about their country. They care about YOU, someone they have never met. You can't go around being apathetic about that. Yes, I do realize that I may not be able to change your beliefs, but I can provide enlightenment on what is actually good for humanity

I am starting to love John Kerry and Howard Dean. The more they speak, the more thay harm the democrats. And Howard Dean's assertion that no democrats accepted money from Abramoff or his clients is ludicris. They did (including Mrs. Bill Clinton herself) and the proof is there. And names will be named. Why is the initial Muslim reaction to everything violent? Ok, so this idiot draws disrepsctful religious cartoons. That does not give you the right to burn and destroy buildings. Did Christians react that way when some jackass put a crucifix in a jar of urine and called it art? No. There were protests, but the were orderly and done in the right manner. I disagree with disrespecting any religion. But violence is not the way to show your disapproval. Christianity today is so disrespected by the so-called "main stream" media and liberal religious figures, but Christians don't act like idiots about it. We don't burn buildings and start riots. I know most followers of Islam aren't idiots. But those that are make the entire religion look bad. I hope the good Muslims eventually prevail over the idiots (terrorists included).

They refused to applaud even when Mr. Bush announced teen pregnancy and crime are at a ten year low. So I guess democrats like crime and seeing 15 year-old girls pregnant. And how about Hillary Clinton sitting there chewing gum like a school girl bored in math class? And she is the leading candidate for the dems in 2008? PLEASE NOMINATE HER!!!! It will just insure another Republican victory. As for the Oscar nominees, terrible once again. The Academy still refuses to give George Lucas any credit for his work and his career. But they give movies like Bareback Mountain praise and award after award. Also, Mickey Rourke got screwed. He should have been up for his role in Sin City. The movie itself should have been up for Best Picture. All the movies nominated were relatively low-budget art house movies that aside from Mountain, no one actually saw. why is that? The most liberal view I have is the complete legalization of marijuana.

Other views:

Abortion: Only in cases of rape, incest or if the pregnancy endangers the life of the mother

Death Penalty:  use it more.  use it for murderers, rapists and child molestors.  If you want to make a Constitutional Amendment on something, make the death penalty legal in all 50 states.  Don't try to ban gay marraige.  That's just silly.

Taxes:  Less of them

Gun Control: The laws we have are just fine.  The problem is pussy-assed sissy judges not punishing criminals enough.  It's never the fucking criminal's fault anymore.  It's always something else.  Keep the real bad guys in jail.  Banning guns and having stricter gun control laws only harms the law-abiding citizen.

Social Security Refrom:  Social Security as it is right now sucks.  If I had my way, I wouldn't have it taken out of my paycheck.  Either allow people to control their own retirement money with private accounts, (I don't know about you, but I trust myself with my money over the government.)  or make Social Security voluntary.  If you pay in, you get it.  If you don't you're on your own.  I'd rather have the bigger paycheck.

Elecoral College:  Get rid of it.  Allow a straight election for President.

Lower the drinking age to 18.  you can vote and join the military at 18.  But you can't drink legally.  That's stupid.

And remove age limits for running for congress and the presidency.  If you are old enough to vote, you should be able to run.

Conservative talk show host Sean Hannidy, along with Col. Oliver North have started a charity called Freedom Alliance. This charity, through donations, provides full scholarships to children who have lost parents in Iraq. Mr. Hannidy and Mr. North don't get a cut of the donations. ALL of the money donated goes to the scholarships. So far, 200 kids have received scholarships. Democrats on the other hand would probably just raise taxes to give the kids scholarships.
